Package main.controller.request

Class StaffManager

java.lang.Object
main.controller.request.StaffManager
Record Components:
user - The user (staff member) creating the camp.
public class StaffManager extends Object
Allows staff to create a new camp for students, guiding them through the input process.

    • editExistingCamp

      public static void editExistingCamp(User user) throws PageBackException, ModelNotFoundException
      Allows staff to edit an existing camp by providing options to update different fields.
      Parameters:
      user - The user (staff member) initiating the camp editing process.
      Throws:
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user chooses to go back during the camp editing process.
      ModelNotFoundException - Thrown if the specified camp ID is not found.

    • deleteExistingCamp

      Allows staff to delete an existing camp after confirming the deletion.
      Parameters:
      user - The user (staff member) initiating the camp deletion process.
      Throws:
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user chooses to go back during the camp deletion process.
      ModelNotFoundException - Thrown if the specified camp ID is not found.

    • viewAndReplyPendingEnquiries

      public static void viewAndReplyPendingEnquiries(User user) throws ModelNotFoundException, PageBackException
      Displays and allows staff to reply to pending enquiries.
      Parameters:
      user - The user (staff member) viewing and replying to enquiries.
      Throws:

    • viewAndHandlePendingSuggestions

      public static void viewAndHandlePendingSuggestions(User user) throws ModelNotFoundException, PageBackException
      Displays and allows staff to handle pending suggestions by approving or rejecting them.
      Parameters:
      user - The user (staff member) handling pending suggestions.
      Throws:
      ModelNotFoundException - Thrown if the specified suggestion ID is not found.
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user chooses to go back during the process.

    • generateReports

      public static void generateReports(User user) throws IOException, PageBackException
      Allows a staff member to generate various reports related to camps. The method presents options to generate reports for all camps or a specific camp, and further allows the selection of specific report types such as student lists, attendee lists, committee lists, enquiries reports, and committee performance reports.
      Parameters:
      user - The staff member initiating the report generation.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs during report generation.
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user chooses to go back during the process.

    • generateAttendeeReport

      public static void generateAttendeeReport(String campID) throws PageBackException, ModelNotFoundException
      Generates a CSV report for the attendees of a specific camp, including camp details and the list of attendees. The report is saved in the project's resources directory.
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique identifier of the camp for which the report is generated.
      Throws:
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user chooses to go back after report generation.
      ModelNotFoundException - Thrown if the camp with the specified ID is not found.

    • generatePerformaceReport

      public static void generatePerformaceReport(String campID) throws PageBackException, ModelNotFoundException
      Generates a performance report for camp committee members and saves it to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp for which the report is generated.
      Throws:
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user decides to go back.
      ModelNotFoundException - Thrown if the camp with the specified ID is not found.

    • generateEnquiryReport

      public static void generateEnquiryReport(String campID) throws PageBackException, ModelNotFoundException
      Generates an enquiry report for a specific camp and saves it to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp for which the report is generated.
      Throws:
      PageBackException - Thrown if the user decides to go back.
      ModelNotFoundException - Thrown if the camp with the specified ID is not found.

    • generateCampList

      public static void generateCampList(List<Camp> camps, Staff staff) throws PageBackException
      Generates a comprehensive camp report for a staff member, including details of multiple camps created by the staff. The report is saved in a CSV file format with attendance and committee information for each camp.
      Parameters:
      camps - A list of Camp objects representing the camps attended by the staff.
      staff - The Staff object for whom the report is generated.
      Throws:
      PageBackException - Signals that the user has opted to go back to the previous page.
